name: The Way (itch) (teknajade)
description:
Alone, cold, starving... As you come from an unnatural slumber, you are as bare as the creatures that stalk you. They prove to be, fierce,  ravenous, and unyielding to make you their next meal, but you have something that they don't. The never-ending hunger for life. Surviving in this world will take more then pure strength alone. To truly thrive, you must know the way. 

***This project is currently undergoing heavy development. This is not the finish product, but updates will come as time goes one***
